revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Cave of Origin |image = [[File:Cave of Origin.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Cave of Origin. |tokens = 34,000 |location = On the West of Route 126, Northwest of Sootopolis City. }} '''Cave of Origin''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 590,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=4|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Sableye.png|40px]] Sableye |- | [[File:Mawile.png|40px]] Mawile |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Exploud.png|40px]] Exploud || <center>2,000,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=3|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Kyogre.png|40px]] '''Kyogre*''' || rowspan=2|<center>4,700,000 |- | [[File:Groudon.png|40px]] '''Groudon*''' |- |}
<!--T:6--> '''*Must be Hoenn Champion to unlock Kyogre and Groudon'''
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<tabs> <!--T:8--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:10--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears !! Requirement |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 78.10% || 75.95% || 66.67% || <center> N/A |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 10.42% || 11.07% || 13.86% || rowspan=2|<center> N/A |- | {{Bag2|Ochre Shard}} || N/A || 10.42% || 11.07% || 13.86% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 1.04% || 1.68% || 4.43% || <center> N/A |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Protein}} || N/A || 0% || 0% || 0.59% || 400 Clears |- | {{Bag2|Lum}} || N/A || 0% || 0% || 0.59% || 150 Clears |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:11-->
<!--T:12--> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:13--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears !! Requirement |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 75.68% || 75.68% || 75.68% || <center> N/A |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 12.11% || 12.11% || 12.11% || rowspan=2|<center> N/A |- | {{Bag2|Ochre Shard}} || N/A || 12.11% || 12.11% || 12.11% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.10% || 0.10% || 0.10% || <center> N/A |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Protein}} || N/A || 0% || 0% || <0.01% || 400 Clears |- | {{Bag2|Lum}} || N/A || 0% || 0% || <0.01% || 150 Clears |} </tab> </tabs>
